results.title: The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy
results.text_hl: The effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on alleviation of @DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@-like @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@ in adolescent @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ exposed prenatally to @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@valproic acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@VPA@@@) was compared to that of @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@.

citations.NLM: Atia AA, Ashour RH, Zaki MM, Rahman KM, Ramadan NM. The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy Psychopharmacology (Berl). 2023 Jun;240(6):1313-1332. PMID: 37133558

results.title: Metformin accelerates myelin recovery and ameliorates behavioral deficits in the animal model of multiple sclerosis via adjustment of AMPK/Nrf2/mTOR signaling and maintenance of endogenous oligodendrogenesis during brain self-repairing period.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ accelerates myelin recovery and ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@ in the animal model of @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@ via adjustment of AMPK/@GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_18024 @@@Nrf2@@@/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@ signaling and maintenance of endogenous oligodendrogenesis during brain self-repairing period.

citations.NLM: Sanadgol N, Barati M, Houshmand F, Hassani S, Clarner T, Shahlaei M, Golab F. Metformin accelerates myelin recovery and ameliorates behavioral deficits in the animal model of multiple sclerosis via adjustment of AMPK/Nrf2/mTOR signaling and maintenance of endogenous oligodendrogenesis during brain self-repairing period. Pharmacol Rep. 2020 Jun;72(3):641-658. PMID: 32048246

results.title: Dendrobium nobile Lindl. Alkaloids Ameliorate Cognitive Dysfunction in Senescence Accelerated SAMP8 Mice by Decreasing Amyloid-beta Aggregation and Enhancing Autophagy Activity.
results.text_hl: Age-matched SAMR1 @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were used as controls. DNLA and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatments ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@ of 12-month-old @CELLLINE_CVCL:K252 @@@SAMP8@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, as determined by Rotarod, Y-maze, and Open-field tests.

citations.NLM: Lv LL, Liu B, Liu J, Li LS, Jin F, Xu YY, Wu Q, Liu J, Shi JS. Dendrobium nobile Lindl. Alkaloids Ameliorate Cognitive Dysfunction in Senescence Accelerated SAMP8 Mice by Decreasing Amyloid-beta Aggregation and Enhancing Autophagy Activity. J Alzheimers Dis. 2020;76(2):657-669. PMID: 32538851

results.title: Developmental arsenic exposure impairs cognition, directly targets DNMT3A, and reduces DNA methylation.
results.text_hl: @GENE_DNMT3A @GENE_13435 @@@DNMT3A@@@ degradation leads to genome-wide DNA hypomethylation in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ embryonic fibroblasts but not in non-embryonic cell lines. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a first-line antidiabetic agent reported to increase DNA methylation, ameliorates the @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@ and normalizes the aberrant expression of cognition-related genes and DNA methylation in the hippocampus of @CHEMICAL_Arsenic @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001151 @@@arsenic@@@-exposed offspring.

citations.NLM: Yan N, Li Y, Xing Y, Wu J, Li J, Liang Y, Tang Y, Wang Z, Song H, Wang H, Xiao S, Lu M. Developmental arsenic exposure impairs cognition, directly targets DNMT3A, and reduces DNA methylation. EMBO Rep. 2022 Jun 7;23(6):e54147. PMID: 35373418

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Cognitive Impairments in Hypoxia-Ischemia Neonatal Rats via Improving Remyelination.
results.text_hl: These data indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ is beneficial for the amelioration of @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@H/I@@@-induced myelination and @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavior deficits@@@.

citations.NLM: Qi B, Hu L, Zhu L, Shang L, Sheng L, Wang X, Liu N, Wen N, Yu X, Wang Q, Yang Y. Metformin Attenuates Cognitive Impairments in Hypoxia-Ischemia Neonatal Rats via Improving Remyelination. Cell Mol Neurobiol. 2017 Oct;37(7):1269-1278. PMID: 28035478

results.title: Metformin Administration During Early Postnatal Life Rescues Autistic-Like Behaviors in the BTBR T+ Itpr3tf/J Mouse Model of Autism
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that early @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment may have beneficial effects on ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@ in @DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@ASD@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Cai Y, Fan X. Metformin Administration During Early Postnatal Life Rescues Autistic-Like Behaviors in the BTBR T+ Itpr3tf/J Mouse Model of Autism Front Behav Neurosci. 2018;12():290. PMID: 30555309

results.title: Chronic metformin treatment improves post-stroke angiogenesis and recovery after experimental stroke.
results.text_hl: Importantly even if @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment was initiated 24 h after injury it enhanced recovery and significantly improved @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_and_Disruptive_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019958 @@@behavioral deficits@@@.

citations.NLM: Venna VR, Li J, Hammond MD, Mancini NS, McCullough LD. Chronic metformin treatment improves post-stroke angiogenesis and recovery after experimental stroke. Eur J Neurosci. 2014 Jun;39(12):2129-38. PMID: 24649970
